H0.text: Who was part man, part machine, all cop and hailed from a futuristic Detroit. Inspector Gadget

H1.text: Who was part man, part machine, all cop and hailed from a futuristic Detroit. The Terminator

H2.text: Who was part man, part machine, all cop and hailed from a futuristic Detroit. Judge Dredd

H3.text: Who was part man, part machine, all cop and hailed from a futuristic Detroit. RoboCop

A4.text: A Detroit police officer murdered in the line of duty and revived as a cyborg.
